title: Authorizes an additional housing court judge for the city of Buffalo
summary: Authorizes an additional part-time housing court judge for the city of Buffalo.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3343

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. HOYT -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Judiciary

       AN ACT to amend the uniform city court act, in relation to authorizing a
         part-time housing court judge in the city of Buffalo

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  7  of  subdivision  (d) of section 2104 of the
    2  uniform city court act, as amended by chapter 493 of the laws  of  2006,
    3  is amended to read as follows:
    4    7 Buffalo, thirteen full-time AND ONE PART-TIME;
    5    S 2. Section 2104 of the uniform city court act is amended by adding a
    6  new subdivision (g) to read as follows:
    7    (G)  NOTWITHSTANDING PARAGRAPH TWO OF SUBDIVISION (B) OF THIS SECTION,
    8  THE PART-TIME JUDGE FOR THE CITY OF BUFFALO SHALL HAVE HIS OR HER JURIS-
    9  DICTION LIMITED SOLELY TO HOUSING COURT ISSUES.
   10    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD08058-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the uniform city court act, in relation to authorizing a part-time housing court judge in the city of Buffalo
